channel.title: QUESTION- Shop opens on talk command?
channel.description: I've got bob selling some rune sets but when you right click him and click trade nothing shows up but if you click on him or right click and talk the items show up, can this be switched to right click->trade?

item.title: QUESTION- Shop opens on talk command?
item.dc:creator: @sqeker sqeker
item.description:
@sqeker wrote:

Yes, i copied your code CTRL-F and pasted and it was there…
